uri.description: The URI of the configuration entity

sequence_no.description: The index of the QoS Policy Action inside the list. It can be either manually set or auto-generated..

policy_id.description: QoS Policy to which this action applies.

traffic_class_id.description: ID of the QoS Traffic Class.

first_action.description: First action to be taken upon traffic class match.

second_action.description: Second action to be taken upon traffic class match.
